metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9338 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Inadequate escaping lead to XSS vulnerability in the search module in ownCloud Server before 8.2.12, 9.0.x before 9.0.10, 9.1.x before 9.1.6, and 10.0.x before 10.0.2. To be exploitable a user has to write or paste malicious content into the search dialogue.

criterions.comment: owncloud: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
